scenario: Browse the menu, customize a pizza, add to cart, and checkout

snapshots.title: Pizza Delivery & Carryout, Pasta, Wings & More | Domino's
snapshots.bodyHTML:
Skip to main content
  • Menu
  • Deals
  • My Rewards
  • Tracker

Start your order

DeliveryOrCarryout

Choose Carryout or DeliveryGet Domino's delivered to your door or pick up at a store.

Mix and match Choose any two for $6.99 each.

Your choice of any two or more medium pizzas, sides, and desserts. Upgrade to Parmesan Stuffed Crust for $4 more.

PRICES HIGHER FOR SOME LOCATIONS. You must ask for this limited time offer. Prices, participation, delivery area, and charges may vary by store. 2-item minimum. Bone-in Wings, Handmade Pan and Parmesan Stuffed Crust pizzas will cost extra. 

Limited time Best deal ever Any pizza. Any toppings. $9.99 each.

Choose your crust. Choose your size. Choose up to 7 toppings.

PRICES HIGHER FOR SOME LOCATIONS Excludes XL and Specialty Pizzas. Parmesan Stuffed Crust will be extra. Select this offer from 2/23/26-4/6/26. Online Only. Size availability varies by crust type. Max. 7 toppings (6 for Pan and NY Style crust). Min. purchase required for delivery. Prices, participation, delivery area and charges may vary. 

Weeklong carryout Carry out for just $7.99 each.

Spend less dough when you carry out a 1-topping pizza on any of our 6 delicious crusts, plus 8-piece wings or boneless chicken.

PRICES HIGHER FOR SOME LOCATIONS. You must ask for this offer. Prices, participation, and charges may vary. Carryout only. Excludes XL and Specialty Pizzas. 

The perfect combo Get all of this for just $19.99.

Get two medium 1-topping pizzas and two orders of 16-piece bread bites. Choose from savory flavors like Parmesan or Garlic or indulge with sweet Cinnamon.

PRICES HIGHER FOR SOME LOCATIONS. You must ask for this limited time offer. Delivery charge and tax may apply. Prices, participation, delivery area, and charges may vary. Handmade Pan and Parmesan Stuffed Crust pizzas will be extra. No substitutions permitted. For details on pricing, contact your local store. Pricing for online orders available at checkout. 

Local deals Find your local store's coupons.

1 / 5

Mix and match Choose any two for $6.99 each.

Your choice of any two or more medium pizzas, sides, and desserts. Upgrade to Parmesan Stuffed Crust for $4 more.

PRICES HIGHER FOR SOME LOCATIONS. You must ask for this limited time offer. Prices, participation, delivery area, and charges may vary by store. 2-item minimum. Bone-in Wings, Handmade Pan and Parmesan Stuffed Crust pizzas will cost extra. 

Explore more deals

Limited time Best deal ever Any pizza. Any toppings. $9.99 each.

Choose your crust. Choose your size. Choose up to 7 toppings.

PRICES HIGHER FOR SOME LOCATIONS Excludes XL and Specialty Pizzas. Parmesan Stuffed Crust will be extra. Select this offer from 2/23/26-4/6/26. Online Only. Size availability varies by crust type. Max. 7 toppings (6 for Pan and NY Style crust). Min. purchase required for delivery. Prices, participation, delivery area and charges may vary.

Weeklong carryout Carry out for just $7.99 each.

Spend less dough when you carry out a 1-topping pizza on any of our 6 delicious crusts, plus 8-piece wings or boneless chicken.

PRICES HIGHER FOR SOME LOCATIONS. You must ask for this offer. Prices, participation, and charges may vary. Carryout only. Excludes XL and Specialty Pizzas.

The perfect combo Get all of this for just $19.99.

Get two medium 1-topping pizzas and two orders of 16-piece bread bites. Choose from savory flavors like Parmesan or Garlic or indulge with sweet Cinnamon.

PRICES HIGHER FOR SOME LOCATIONS. You must ask for this limited time offer. Delivery charge and tax may apply. Prices, participation, delivery area, and charges may vary. Handmade Pan and Parmesan Stuffed Crust pizzas will be extra. No substitutions permitted. For details on pricing, contact your local store. Pricing for online orders available at checkout.

Local deals Find your local store's coupons.

What's new

Specialty Pizzas

Treat yo self to our best, most premium medium Specialty Pizzas when you Mix & Match.

Earn free Domino's every 2 orders
See Domino'sÂ® Rewards

Legal

  • Do Not Sell My Information
  • Privacy
  • Terms of Use

Mix & Match Offer Details

You must choose this limited time offer. Prices, participation, delivery area, and charges may vary by store. 2-item minimum. Bone-in Wings, Parmesan Stuffed Crust and Pan Pizza are extra. Each store may charge extra for some items, crust types, toppings, and sauces. Choose or contact your local store for specific offer pricing. Delivery orders subject to each store's delivery minimum and delivery charge. Any delivery charge is not a tip paid to your driver. Drivers carry less than $20.

Weeklong Carryout Offer Details

Carryout only. You must choose for this limited time offer. Prices, participation and charges may vary. Size availability varies by crust type. Parmesan Stuffed Crust will be extra. Excludes XL and Specialty Pizzas. In addition, your local store may charge extra for some toppings and sauces.

Perfect Combo Offer Details

You must choose this limited time offer. Delivery charge and tax may apply. Prices, participation, delivery area and charges may vary. Parmesan Stuffed Crust and Handmade Pan will be extra. No substitutions permitted. In addition, your local store may charge extra for some toppings and sauces.

Offer Details

Any Delivery Charge is not a tip paid to your driver. Please reward your driver for awesomeness. Drivers carry less than $20. Minimum purchase required for delivery. Delivery charge and tax may apply. Prices, participation, delivery area and charges may vary. Returned checks, along with the state's maximum allowable returned check fee, may be electronically presented to your bank. Â©2024 Domino's IP Holder LLC. Domino'sÂ®, Domino's PizzaÂ® and the game piece logo are registered trademarks of Domino's IP Holder LLC. "Coca-Cola" and the Contour Bottle design are registered trademarks of The Coca-Cola Company. Apple, the Apple logo and iPad are trademarks of Apple Inc., registered in the U.S. and other countries. App Store is a service mark of Apple Inc. Android is a trademark of Google Inc. WindowsÂ® Phone is a registered trademark of the Microsoft group of companies.

CA Transparency in Supply Chains Act Disclosures

CA Consumer Privacy Act

Accessibility Policy

If you are using a screen reader and are having problems using this website, please call 800-252-4031 for assistance.

This site is protected by reCAPTCHA Enterprise and the Google Privacy Policy and Terms of Service apply.

CA Transparency in Supply Chains Act Disclosures

CA Consumer Privacy Act

Accessibility Policy

If you are using a screen reader and are having problems using this website, please call 800-252-4031 for assistance.

We value your privacy.â

We and third parties we work with use cookies and other technologies to collect and disclose information about you for the purposes described in our Privacy Policy. Click âReject Allâ to disable non-essential technologies and opt-out of sales, shares, and targeted advertising on this site. You can also use a recognized preference signal like Global Privacy Control. These choices apply only to this browser and reset if you clear cookies. To opt-out for our mobile app, configure âDo Not Sellâ within the app. To opt-out for information we have about you in our systems (like your email address), submit a separate request through this link.

proposalPrompt:
# WebMCP Tool Proposal Request

You are analyzing a website to propose WebMCP tool definitions that will let an AI agent interact with it.

**Target URL:** https://www.dominos.com
**Scenario:** Browse the menu, customize a pizza, add to cart, and checkout
**Pages analyzed:** 1
**Analysis timestamp:** 2026-02-26T00:49:13.182Z

## DOM Analysis

### Page: https://www.dominos.com/
Total interactive elements: 94

#### Region: unknown
Selector: `body`
Elements: 94

- `#toggle-menu` â button type="button" aria-label="Menu" name="Hamburger Menu" id="toggle-menu" [trigger]
- `button[name="Blue Nav - Order Now"]` â button type="button" text="Order Now" name="Blue Nav - Order Now" [trigger]
- `button:has-text("Choose your location")` â button type="button" text="Choose your location" [trigger]
- `button:has-text("Sign In")` â button type="button" text="Sign In" [trigger]
- `button[aria-label="View cart - empty"]` â button type="button" aria-label="View cart - empty" text="empty cart" [trigger]
- `button:has-text("Order Online")` â button type="button" text="Order Online" [trigger]
- `#tile-button-MixAndMatch` â button type="button" text="Add deal" id="tile-button-MixAndMatch" [trigger]
- `button:has-text("Offer details.")` â button type="button" text="Offer details." [trigger]
- `#tile-button-BestDealEver` â button type="button" text="Add deal" id="tile-button-BestDealEver" [trigger]
- `button:has-text("Offer details")` â button type="button" text="Offer details" [trigger]
- `#tile-button-WeekLongCarryout` â button type="button" text="Add deal" id="tile-button-WeekLongCarryout" [trigger]

## Instructions

Based on the DOM and JS analysis above, propose a set of WebMCP tool definitions that would allow an AI agent to interact with this website.

### Guidelines

1. **Prefer JS calls over DOM actions** â If a function like `window.addToCart(id, qty)` exists, create a tool that calls it directly rather than clicking buttons.

2. **Group related actions** â A form with name, email, and submit should be ONE tool (e.g., `submitContactForm`) that fills all fields and submits, not separate tools per field.

3. **Include read-only tools** â If there's data to read (cart contents, search results, menu items), create getter tools with `readOnlyHint: true`.

4. **Name tools descriptively** â Use camelCase names that describe the action: `searchProducts`, `addToCart`, `getCartTotal`, `submitCheckout`.

5. **Set annotations correctly:**
   - `readOnlyHint: true` â for tools that only read data (getMenu, getCart, searchResults)
   - `destructiveHint: true` â for tools that delete or irreversibly modify data (clearCart, deleteAccount)
   - `confirmationHint: true` â for tools that involve purchases, submissions, or significant actions (checkout, submitOrder)

6. **Define input schemas precisely** â Use appropriate types, add descriptions, set required fields, use enums where options are known.

7. **Action type selection:**
   - `js-call` â When a global function or API method is detected that performs the action directly
   - `dom-action` â When no JS API exists and the tool must interact with DOM elements (click, fill, select)

8. **URL patterns** â If tools only apply to certain pages, set `urlPattern` (e.g., `"https://example.com/products/*"`).

## Output Format

Respond with a JSON array of tool proposals. Each proposal should follow this schema:

```json
[
  {
    "name": "toolName",
    "description": "What this tool does",
    "inputSchema": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "paramName": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "What this parameter is for"
        }
      },
      "required": ["paramName"]
    },
    "actionType": "js-call",
    "actionDetails": {
      "functionPath": "window.someFunction",
      "argMapping": ["paramName"],
      "returnType": "object"
    },
    "annotations": {
      "readOnlyHint": false,
      "destructiveHint": false,
      "confirmationHint": false
    },
    "urlPattern": "https://example.com/*"
  },
  {
    "name": "anotherTool",
    "description": "Another tool using DOM actions",
    "inputSchema": {
      "type": "object",
      "properties": {
        "query": {
          "type": "string",
          "description": "Search query"
        }
      },
      "required": ["query"]
    },
    "actionType": "dom-action",
    "actionDetails": {
      "steps": [
        {
          "action": "fill",
          "selector": "input[name='search']",
          "inputProperty": "query"
        },
        {
          "action": "click",
          "selector": "button[type='submit']"
        },
        {
          "action": "read",
          "selector": ".search-results",
          "readAttribute": "textContent",
          "delay": 1000
        }
      ]
    },
    "annotations": {
      "readOnlyHint": true
    }
  }
]
```

Propose tools that cover the described scenario. Aim for 3-10 tools that give an agent comprehensive control over the key user flows on the site.
